name: Soda Cap - Bitsy Style Retro Platformer
name_original: Soda Cap - Bitsy Style Retro Platformer
description:
You're thirsty but can't afford a soda pop. Find some coins!

Soda Cap is a 64x64 html5 platformer designed to look like a bitsty game.

I plan to add: music, sound effects, more levels, mobile controls, controller support and some surprises. Please follow me on itch.io

If you like the game and want to see more, please buy me a cup of coffee by donating a dollar. ;)

Controls are:

  • Z = Jump
  • X = Fire
  • R = Restart
  • L & R Arrows = Move

Thank you, enjoy.
